name: BCoin - currency simulator
description:
Buy, sell & speculate = BCoin - currency simulator

You are investing in cryptocurrency called BCoin.

You begin with 4000$. Earn the money by buying and selling BCoins at the right time. Your actions are impacting the demand and price!

Hints:

  • Buy when the price is low, sell when the price is high.
  • Speculate (when you are buying, the price is getting higher, when you are selling, the price is getting lower)
  • Monitor your current founds (top right corner of the screen). Without it, you can not buy new bcoins!

Controls:

Buy [Z] or [Arrow UP]

Sell [X] or [Arrow DOWN]
